flavorText: Occasionally the living wander to the Rivers, but the wardens of Athreos ensure that only the dead pass.

foreignData.flavorText: Gelegentlich verirren sich auch die Lebenden an die Ufer der Flüsse, aber Athreos' Wächter sorgen dafür, dass nur die Toten übersetzen.
foreignData.name: Grimmiger Wächter
foreignData.text: Konstellation — Immer wenn der Grimmige Wächter oder eine andere Verzauberung unter deiner Kontrolle ins Spiel kommt, verliert jeder Gegner 1 Lebenspunkt.

foreignData.flavorText: En ocasiones, los vivos deambulan por los Ríos, pero los guardas de Atreos se aseguran de que solo pasen los muertos.
foreignData.name: Guardián siniestro
foreignData.text: Constelación — Siempre que el Guardián siniestro u otro encantamiento entre al campo de batalla bajo tu control, cada oponente pierde 1 vida.

foreignData.flavorText: Parfois, les vivants errent jusqu'aux Fleuves, mais les gardiens d'Athréos ne laissent passer que les morts.
foreignData.name: Sinistre garde
foreignData.text: Constellation — À chaque fois que le Sinistre garde ou un autre enchantement arrive sur le champ de bataille sous votre contrôle, chaque adversaire perd 1 point de vie.

foreignData.flavorText: Talvolta i vivi raggiungono i Fiumi, ma i custodi di Atreo si assicurano che siano solo i morti a passare.
foreignData.name: Tetro Guardiano
foreignData.text: Costellazione — Ogniqualvolta il Tetro Guardiano o un altro incantesimo entrano nel campo di battaglia sotto il tuo controllo, ogni avversario perde 1 punto vita.

foreignData.flavorText: 時折生者が河に辿りつくことがあるが、そこを通過するのが死者だけであることを確実にしているのがエイスリオスの管理人たちである。
foreignData.name: 厳かな守護者
foreignData.text: 星座 ― 厳かな守護者か他のエンチャントが１つあなたのコントロール下で戦場に出るたび、各対戦相手はそれぞれ１点のライフを失う。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー・エンチャント — ゾンビ

foreignData.flavorText: 가끔 산 자들이 강 근처를 배회하지만 에스리오스의 관리자들은 죽은 자들만 통과시킨다.
foreignData.name: 음산한 수호자
foreignData.text: 성좌 — 음산한 수호자나 다른 부여마법이 당신의 조종 하에 전장에 들어올 때마다, 각 상대는 생명 1점을 잃는다.

foreignData.flavorText: Às vezes, os vivos caminham até os Rios, mas os guardiões de Atreos garantem que só os mortos atravessem.
foreignData.name: Guardião Sinistro
foreignData.text: Constelação — Toda vez que Guardião Sinistro ou outro encantamento entra no campo de batalha sob seu controle, cada oponente perde 1 ponto de vida.

foreignData.flavorText: Временами к Рекам приходят и живые, но стражники Атрея пропускают лишь мертвецов.
foreignData.name: Мрачный Хранитель
foreignData.text: Созвездие — Каждый раз, когда Мрачный Хранитель или другие чары выходят на поле битвы под вашим контролем, каждый оппонент теряет 1 жизнь.

foreignData.flavorText: 偶尔会有活人在河边游荡，但雅睿欧斯的护卫将确保只有死者才能渡河。
foreignData.name: 狰狞守卫
foreignData.text: 星彩～每当狰狞守卫或另一个结界在你的操控下进战场时，每位对手各失去1点生命。

foreignData.flavorText: 偶爾會有活人在河邊游蕩，但雅睿歐斯的護衛將確保只有死者才能渡河。
foreignData.name: 猙獰守衛
foreignData.text: 星彩～每當猙獰守衛或另一個結界在你的操控下進戰場時，每位對手各失去1點生命。

name: Grim Guardian
originalText: Constellation — Whenever Grim Guardian or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, each opponent loses 1 life.

rulings.text: A constellation ability triggers whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control for any reason. Enchantments with other card types, such as enchantment creatures, will also cause constellation abilities to trigger.

An Aura spell without bestow that has an illegal target when it tries to resolve won't resolve and will be put into its owner's graveyard. It won't enter the battlefield and constellation abilities won't trigger. An Aura spell with bestow won't be countered this way. It will revert to being an enchantment creature and resolve, entering the battlefield and triggering constellation abilities.

When an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, each constellation ability of permanents you control will trigger. You can put these abilities on the stack in any order. The last ability you put on the stack will be the first one that resolves.

text: Constellation — Whenever Grim Guardian or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, each opponent loses 1 life.
